data.actual_result: The in-app camera popup bounces as you spam click and somehow prevents it from closing immediately
data.expected_result: The first click shoud close the popup and any other click should be registered by the chat behind
data.short_description: In-app camera will bounce if you spam click the area above the in-app camera
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in a text channel and tap the + button - Go to in-app camera tab - Spam click the area above the popup
